name: Yet Another Space Game
description:
in this game you fight hordes of drones that try to swarm and kill you. this is the very first version (that currently lacks sound) and the game will be updated in the future.

Version 0.0.1.2

Sound update.

  • Added sound to the game.
  • Drone A.I. is improved.
  • Adjusted movement speed and maneuverability
  • Fixed 'stardust' particles
  • Other misc. stuff.

Version 0.0.1.0

This is the first version!

  • hello world!
